name: submergible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to be used under water: a submergible pump Submergible boats have two hulls, one inside the other. See
submerge
More examplesFewer examplesGive your child a small submergible basket and bait and do some crabbing. There have been numerous reports of unknown submergible craft entering and leaving the lake.Because the phone has no speaker or mic holes, it is submergible.
